sentences: Probably born into a noble Flemish family in Cysoing, "messire" Jacques probably flourished during the reign of Guy of Dampierre as Count of Flanders (1251â€“1305), for he addresses his serventois Li nouviaus tans to the count.

Other events that date Jacques are a reference to the Battle of Mansurah in 1250 in one of his songs and a reference in an envoi of Thomas Herier to "Jakemon" at "Cyson", probably in the third quarter of the century.
